benchmark_details.name: AudioGenie-Reasoner
benchmark_details.overview: AudioGenie-Reasoner (AGR) is a unified training-free multi-agent system that coordinates perception and reasoning over an evolving chain of textual evidence for audio deep reasoning tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To address the challenges of audio deep reasoning by transforming audio into a text understanding task and refining evidence through multi-agent collaboration.

data.source: Evaluated on MMAU-mini and MMAR benchmarks.
data.size: 1,000 closed-form questions for MMAU-mini and 905 samples for MMAR.

methodology.calculation: Comparison of the modelâ€™s predictions with ground truth using regular expressions and string matching.
methodology.validation: Experimental setup validated through comprehensive evaluation against existing benchmarks.
